original_text: So God will certainly not listen to you, Job, when you say that you cannot see him. You say that you have explained your problem to him. You are waiting for him to give you an answer. So God will certainly not listen to you, Job, when you say that you cannot see him. You say that you have explained your problem to him. You are waiting for him to give you an answer. So God will certainly not listen to you, Job,
korean_text: 하물며 말하기를 하나님은 뵈올 수 없고 일의 판단하심은 그 앞에 있으니 나는 그를 기다릴 뿐이라 말하는 그대일까보냐

sentences.original_text: So God will certainly not listen to you, Job
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 하나님은 분명히 당신을 듣지 않을 것입니다, 욥이여

sentences.original_text: when you say that you cannot see him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그를 볼 수 없다고 말할 때

sentences.original_text: You say that you have explained your problem to him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 문제를 그에게 설명했다고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: You are waiting for him to give you an answer
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그가 답변을 주시기를 기다리고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: So God will certainly not listen to you, Job
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 하나님은 분명히 당신을 듣지 않을 것입니다, 욥이여
